monster.name: Evil Cake

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the Evil Cake remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary cake.

trait.name: Acid Absorption
entries: Whenever the the Evil Cake is subjected to acid damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the acid damage dealt.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Evil Cake makes one bite attack and one scid stuffing spit attack or use your Chocolate Rain.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage, plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Acid Stuffing Spit
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) acid damage.

action.name: Chocolate Rain {@recharge}
entries: The Evil Cake wobbles and sour chocolate flies in all directions within 30ft of it. Each creature within the area must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or be covered in acid chocolate. On a failed save, the creature takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage and until someone takes an action to remove the acid, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) acid damage at the start of each its turns. On a success, the creature takes half damage and is unaffected by the acid on subsequent turns.

legendaryHeader: The Evil Cake can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Evil Cake regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Acid Stuffing Spit
entries: The Evil Cake make one attack with its Acid Stuffing Spit

legendary.name: Sweetness (Costs 2 actions)
entries: Choose a creature that the Evil Cake can see. The creature must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition charmed} by the sweetness of the Evil Cake. While in this condition, the creature must use its movement to approach the Evil Cake and it will be craving it. The creature can't attack the cake, and it can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turn. Evil Cake has advantage on attacks rolls against the {@condition charmed} creature and whenever the creature takes damage it can roll the Wisdom saving throw again.

legendary.name: Chocolate Rain (Costs 3 actions)
entries: Evil Cake automatically recharges your Chocolate Rain
